column4: Ubuntu how I love you... but you don't love me... my mouse constantly freezes... so while we have had good times in the past... nobody on IRC or the forum knows why this is happening...
because it is not Ubuntu, it is your HW
it was working great until the HD died, then i did a fresh install...
it is a Logitech G7 and worked great before the HD crach, and works great in windows
